channel.title: MathJax on A minimal Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in MathJax on A minimal Hugo website

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This sample post is mainly for blogdown users. If you do not use blogdown, you can skip the first section. 1. Markdown or R Markdown This post is written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The differences include: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in R Markdown you can embed R code chunks. A plain Markdown post is rendered via Goldmark, while R Markdown is compiled with rmarkdown and Pandoc.
